Hey folks, weâ€™re rolling out an update to dnd_area tags and their associated styles. Moving the styles from the `standard_footer_includes` to the `standard_header_includes`.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/drag-and-drop-area-styles-moved-from-footer-to-header>

Hey Everyone, we just wanted to let you know about a new channel that is available in the slack. Introducing the <#C016CS822C9|academy-courses> channel! This is a place for peer-to-peer discussions surrounding our developer related academy courses. Feel free to join the channel today :slightly_smiling_face: (shoutout to <@UMZFZHVUJ> for the idea!)
